can imagine.

Dm_OP_0011_Text_017_b_00:

to your weapon or shield, thereby
enhancing it.
Dm_OP_0011_Text_008_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Use Ultrahand, and receive the blessing

You'll find it quite useful in all sorts of
